overview:
Tony is the Director of Business Development for Bamboo Rose, a Tradestone Software company.

Bamboo Rose is where Retail and Brand Buyers create inspirations and wish lists of the lines they want to get produced to up front shop their Suppliers/Factories and create their global buying trips around that. Suppliers showcase themselves and create virtual showrooms of their relevant offerings to their clients’ needs.

Behind Tony is over twenty years experience in international sales and business development. Prior to Bamboo Rose, Tony was the Global Director of the Textiles Sourcing Marketplace at MFG.com, the world’s largest online marketplace for manufacturing, where he grew the marketplace from zero to 50,000 Buyers & Suppliers and an annual sourcing activity on the platform of over $1billion.

Prior to MFG.com Tony was the President of the boutique sourcing and licensing firm AFI Corporation, helping American brands source production overseas, as well as getting retail placement for licensed brands internationally in places such as Carrefour (China), Seiyu (Japan), and Arcadia Group (UK).

Also an entrepreneur, Tony was the Co-Founder and President of Berik, one of the world’s most recognized technical motorsports apparel brands. Tony’s focus was on taking the brand global by opening distribution worldwide and driving growth via private label production. He sold his stake in the company 2005.

Prior to founding his own company, Tony was one of the Directors of Sales at the iconic Italian coffee brand illy where he worked with the best of the best in the HORECA industry.

Tony has a degree in International Business and is well traveled to over 40 countries. He maintains a two blogs at www.tonyforcucci.com where he writes actively on his experiences.
